name: The Sims 4: Island Living
description:
The Sims 4: Island Living is a simulation game. It was originally released in 2019. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
The Sims 4: Island Living is available on PC.
Grant Rodiek, Kevin Gibson and Ryan Michael Vaughan produced the game. It was scored by Ilan Eshkeri.
